text: Lipi Singh is an Indian police officer. She is a 2016 batch IPS officer. Singh is the daughter of former IAS officer and JD(U) leader Rajya Sabha Member of Parliament Ramchandra Prasad Singh. She became popular after her actions taken as a police officer against the independent Member of the Legislative Assembly Anant Singh following the recovery of rifles, cartridges, and bombs from his ancestral house. == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Indian police officers
title: Lipi Singh
